statements: SELECT player_id, achievement_name, progress FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM game_progress WHERE progress < 20 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT player_id FROM game_progress WHERE achievement_name = 'Level 1';
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE player_id = 1 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, SUM(progress) as total_progress FROM game_progress GROUP BY achievement_name;
SELECT player_id, MAX(progress) as highest_progress FROM game_progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING highest_progress > 50;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, progress FROM game_progress WHERE progress > 30 ORDER BY player_id ASC, progress DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT player_id) as total_players, AVG(progress) as average_progress FROM game_progress;
SELECT * FROM achievements;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(progress_percentage) AS avg_progress FROM progress;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_id, achievement_name FROM achievements WHERE achievement_id < 5 ORDER BY achievement_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_description FROM achievements WHERE achievement_name LIKE '%completed%';
SELECT * FROM progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(progress_id) as num_progress FROM progress GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_progress > 2 ORDER BY num_progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM players WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements WHERE achievement_points > 50;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, progress FROM players p INNER JOIN player_progress pp ON p.player_id = pp.player_id INNER JOIN achievements a ON pp.achievement_id = a.achievement_id ORDER BY p.player_name, a.achievement_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, progress FROM player_progress JOIN players ON player_progress.player_id = players.player_id;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_points FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_points DESC;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, progress FROM player_progress JOIN players ON player_progress.player_id = players.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_progress.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id WHERE progress > 50;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, progress FROM player_progress JOIN players ON player_progress.player_id = players.player_id JOIN achievements ON player_progress.achievement_id = achievements.achievement_id ORDER BY player_name ASC, progress DESC;
SELECT player_name, COUNT(*) AS total_achievements FROM player_progress JOIN players ON player_progress.player_id = players.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_achievements >= 3;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM player ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM player WHERE player_id = 2;
SELECT player_name, player_id FROM player WHERE player_name LIKE '%Alice%' ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE player_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM player_stats WHERE total_points > 1000 ORDER BY games_played DESC, highest_score DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, progress_status FROM player p JOIN progress pg ON p.player_id = pg.player_id JOIN achievements a ON pg.achievement_id = a.achievement_id WHERE p.player_id = 1;

SELECT player_name, achievement_name, progress_status FROM player p JOIN progress pg ON p.player_id = pg.player_id JOIN achievements a ON pg.achievement_id = a.achievement_id WHERE progress_status = 'completed' ORDER BY p.player_name ASC;

SELECT p.player_name, ps.games_played, ps.total_points, a.achievement_name, pg.progress_status FROM player p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id JOIN progress pg ON p.player_id = pg.player_id JOIN achievements a ON pg.achievement_id = a.achievement_id WHERE progress_status = 'in_progress';

SELECT p.player_name, MAX(ps.highest_score) AS highest_score FROM player p JOIN player_stats ps ON p.player_id = ps.player_id GROUP BY p.player_name HAVING highest_score > 500 ORDER BY highest_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Players;
SELECT player_name, level FROM Players WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_name, level, join_date FROM Players WHERE join_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PlayerAchievements;
SELECT player_id, achievement_name FROM PlayerAchievements WHERE achievement_id = 1 ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, level FROM Players WHERE level > 10;
SELECT * FROM Achievements WHERE achievement_id = 5;
SELECT player_name, level, join_date FROM Players ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT achievement_name, description FROM Achievements WHERE achievement_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT player_name, progress, last_updated FROM PlayerProgress WHERE progress < 50 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
